'''''Amon Hen'' 142''' is the one-hundred-and-forty-second issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in November [[1996]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Ulmo Lord of the Waters''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* The View from the Hill (Editorial)
** By: Richard Fraser Overton
* Contents
* Announcements from Bywater
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* [[Oxonmoot]] 1997
* The Second Northern Tolkien Festival
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* Review: the 1997 Tolkien Calendar
** By: Ian Collier
** By: Nick Basi
* Report: Hobbiton
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]]
* Knight of the Golden Flower
** By: Juha-Matti Henriksson
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Tolk Folk
* Committee
